allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Fix i18n import paths and migrate import components

Fixed all i18n module resolution errors and migrated import-related components to use translation system.

Changes:
- Fixed 9 files with incorrect i18n import paths
- Migrated ImportButtons.tsx to use i18n hooks
- Migrated ImportFolderButton.tsx to use i18n hooks
- Updated BaseChat.tsx to use new ImportButtons API
- Added comprehensive import-related translations to file.json
- Fixed tabHelpers.ts to import from i18next package directly

Translations:
- Added import.chat.* keys for chat import functionality
- Added import.folder.* keys for folder import functionality
- Supports both Traditional Chinese and English

Technical Details:
- Changed ImportButtons from function to React component to support hooks
- All import-related toast messages now use i18n
- Properly handles interpolation for error messages and progress indicators

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
